name: PRINTER NUMBER
description: Use this command to switch among the 3 LPT printers: LPT1, LPT2 or LPT3.

parameters.name: lpt_number
parameters.description: The printer number to use as the printer output device. This may be 1, 2 or 3.

comments: This value defaults to what you have set in the TAS50.OVL file. You can also change the printer driver with the LD_PDRV (Load Printer Driver) command.
